thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Paul W

author: Paul W
title: Paul W
text:
I like Flight Hub and they are able to resolve many different connection problems with only one main booking as long as you don't have any glitches in your travel plans. Their savings on flights are very hard to beat.
I still 100% reccomend you try them out but do make sure you read and understand the small print. but do not be put off by it.
Flight Hub was very good until I had to change flights due to compassionate reasons. Not their fault, due to a number of different carriers, one was KLM who was able to resolve the problem. I did end up paying a lot more than if I had booked through one main carrier.
However fair to note that 99% of the time this wouldn't happen.
Give them a shot. this is at least my third time of use.
